name: Light Shift
description:
Imagine this, you're going to sleep and both your parents are out of town working. Every time you go to sleep you enter this horrible dimension with ghosts and reapers roaming around. You have with you a trusty candle that shifts the lighting of your surroundings. But beware, the roaming creatures are drawn to it. Can you survive 3 nights until your parents come back home?!

Controls

AD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Use Light

Credits

This game was made during the Climax Game Jam and was made by David Winroth and Nathalie Tuovinen.
